name: ASCPEM-PRF-13 - Data Resource Access not using Connection Pooling capability
description:
Objective
Detection of occurrences of this pattern helps decrease software resource waste by enforcing the sharing of database connections via a connection pool.

Consequence
Software featuring known under-efficient coding practices requires excessive computational resources

qualityRules.name: Quality Rules in numeric ID order
